scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/main.js -b -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/titus.js -b -o dist/js/titus.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:audio
scripts.watch:all: npm run build:all && parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html'
